alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 3:53PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected with near-blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible, mainly over eastern and southern Morrill County. Winds gusting as high as 45 MPH. * WHERE...Morrill County in the western Nebraska Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. The worst conditions are expected overnight tonight into Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Extremely dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
